column3:
Zukin is a Kojin with a new purpose for old chests.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
Inspect octopus traps near the <Emphasis>Adventure</Emphasis> and obtain an octopus.
Deliver the giant koromo octopus to Zukin.

We had some old treasure chests that were lying around, gathering dust. With some creativity on my part, I was able to convert them into octopus traps. And they work exceptionally well, if I may say so myself.
Now, I've a mind to gift the good folk of Kokajiya with a fresh catch, and I should be grateful if you could go out and inspect the traps.
I've laid three over by the wreck southwest of here. One is bound to have caught an octopus by now. My thanks in advance, <Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,1)/>.
There is nothing in this chest.
There is a mess of writhing tentacles in the chest!
Ah, there you are. Did the kami bless us with a catch?
Oho, such a large and lively octopus! Our blacksmith friends shall be pleased!
By the way, did I mention that older chests wreathed in weeds make the best traps? Well, they do. You may wish to remember this for your future reference.
